model

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Game
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class represents the game board. This class is used by the players to move and interact with the items inside the board.
    Author:
    Harman (singhharm1)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      void fromByteArray(byte[] bytes)
      The following method accepts a byte array representing the state of a game board; this state will be broadcast by a master connection, and is then used to overwrite the current state (since it should be more up to date).

      • getAdjacentSpace

        public Location getAdjacentSpace(Position position)
        Finds empty space adjacent to the position. The empty location returned is horizontally or vertically adjacent.
        Parameters:
        position -
        Returns:
        null if there are no empty locations adjacent to position

        public void fromByteArray(byte[] bytes)
                   throws IOException
        The following method accepts a byte array representing the state of a game board; this state will be broadcast by a master connection, and is then used to overwrite the current state (since it should be more up to date).
